_header: Sweet Jesu Christ to Thee / A sinful wretch I yield me
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; prayers, to Virgin Mary; prayers, to guardian angel; prayers, to saints
_description: A series of petitions to Jesus, the Virgin Mary, Angels, Apostles, etc. — forty-six long lines

BodDonC13.First Lines:
Swete Ihesu crist to þe a synful wreche I ȝelde meOf
                    synnes þat I haue do In al my life hidir to…
BodDonC13.Last Lines:
…þat of þair paynes þai haue relese of god grauntid
                    ar ȝe ceseþat þis be fulfillid in dede ilc gode man sai
                    pater noster Aue & Crede
BodDonC13.Editions:
Brown,  Beatrice Daw. 
             “Religious Lyrics in MS. Don. c.13.” 
             Bodleian Quarterly Record
         7 (1932): 1-7 plus frontispiece facsimile of f. 166.
